title.rendered: Performance Tracker Analysis: 2020 Covid-19 Impact Report

content.rendered:
Performance Tracker Analysis: 2020 Covid-19 Impact Report

JCG’s Performance Tracker is the complete customer management tool that evaluates staff and financial performance, streamlines success plans, and improves your bottom line. Through the power of six different survey types, our system analyzes all of the data for you, giving owners and managers hundreds of different reporting options to see what’s going on in your business. This year Johnson Consulting Group did something a little different, 2020 was greatly impacted by the Covid-19 pandemic. With this being the case we commissioned a special report to show how Covid-19 has affected the funeral profession.

Stay tuned as we are creating downloadable worksheets based off the major takeaways from the Performance Tracker Analysis: 2020 Covid-19 Impact Report. 

Download our FREE report below!

PerformanceTracker Analysis: 2020 Covid-19 Impact Full Report 

 

 

Contact us today to learn more about how Johnson Consulting Group can help you grow or sell your business.
